2552  itemTemplate.BagFamily = fields[117].GetUInt32();
2553  itemTemplate.TotemCategory = fields[118].GetUInt32();
2554 
2555  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS; ++i)
2556  {
2557  itemTemplate.Socket[i].Color = uint32(fields[119 + i * 2].GetUInt8());
2558  itemTemplate.Socket[i].Content = fields[120 + i * 2].GetUInt32();
2559  }
2560 
2561  itemTemplate.socketBonus = fields[125].GetUInt32();
2562  itemTemplate.GemProperties = fields[126].GetUInt32();
2563  itemTemplate.RequiredDisenchantSkill = uint32(fields[127].GetInt16());
2564  itemTemplate.ArmorDamageModifier = fields[128].GetFloat();
2565  itemTemplate.Duration = fields[129].GetUInt32();
2566  itemTemplate.ItemLimitCategory = uint32(fields[130].GetInt16());
2567  itemTemplate.HolidayId = fields[131].GetUInt32();
2568  itemTemplate.ScriptId = sObjectMgr->GetScriptId(fields[132].GetCString());
2569  itemTemplate.DisenchantID = fields[133].GetUInt32();
2570  itemTemplate.FoodType = uint32(fields[134].GetUInt8());
2571  itemTemplate.MinMoneyLoot = fields[135].GetUInt32();
2572  itemTemplate.MaxMoneyLoot = fields[136].GetUInt32();
2573  itemTemplate.FlagsCu = fields[137].GetUInt32();
2574 
2575  // Checks
2576  if (itemTemplate.Class >= MAX_ITEM_CLASS)
2577  {
2578  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Class value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Class);
2579  itemTemplate.Class = ITEM_CLASS_MISC;
2580  }
2581 
2582  if (itemTemplate.SubClass >= MaxItemSubclassValues[itemTemplate.Class])
2583  {
2584  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Subclass value (%u) for class %u", entry, itemTemplate.SubClass, itemTemplate.Class);
2585  itemTemplate.SubClass = 0;// exist for all item classes
2586  }
2587 
2588  if (itemTemplate.Quality >= MAX_ITEM_QUALITY)
2589  {
2590  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Quality value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Quality);
2591  itemTemplate.Quality = ITEM_QUALITY_NORMAL;
2592  }
2593 
2594  if (itemTemplate.Flags2 & ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_HORDE_ONLY)
2595  {
2596  if (FactionEntry const* faction = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(HORDE))
2597  if ((itemTemplate.AllowableRace & faction->BaseRepRaceMask[0]) == 0)
2598  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has value (%u) in `AllowableRace` races, not compatible with ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_HORDE_ONLY (%u) in Flags field, item cannot be equipped or used by these races.",
2599  entry, itemTemplate.AllowableRace, ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_HORDE_ONLY);
2600 
2601  if (itemTemplate.Flags2 & ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY)
2602  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has value (%u) in `Flags2` flags (ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY) and ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_HORDE_ONLY (%u) in Flags field, this is a wrong combination.",
2603  entry, ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY, ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_HORDE_ONLY);
2604  }
2605  else if (itemTemplate.Flags2 & ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY)
2606  {
2607  if (FactionEntry const* faction = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(ALLIANCE))
2608  if ((itemTemplate.AllowableRace & faction->BaseRepRaceMask[0]) == 0)
2609  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has value (%u) in `AllowableRace` races, not compatible with ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY (%u) in Flags field, item cannot be equipped or used by these races.",
2610  entry, itemTemplate.AllowableRace, ITEM_FLAGS_EXTRA_ALLIANCE_ONLY);
2611  }
2612 
2613  if (itemTemplate.BuyCount <= 0)
2614  {
2615  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong BuyCount value (%u), set to default(1).", entry, itemTemplate.BuyCount);
2616  itemTemplate.BuyCount = 1;
2617  }
2618 
2619  if (itemTemplate.InventoryType >= MAX_INVTYPE)
2620  {
2621  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong InventoryType value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.InventoryType);
2622  itemTemplate.InventoryType = INVTYPE_NON_EQUIP;
2623  }
2624 
2625  if (itemTemplate.RequiredSkill >= MAX_SKILL_TYPE)
2626  {
2627  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong RequiredSkill value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.RequiredSkill);
2628  itemTemplate.RequiredSkill = 0;
2629  }
2630 
2631  {
2632  // can be used in equip slot, as page read use in inventory, or spell casting at use
2633  bool req = itemTemplate.InventoryType != INVTYPE_NON_EQUIP || itemTemplate.PageText;
2634  if (!req)
2635  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++j)
2636  {
2637  if (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId)
2638  {
2639  req = true;
2640  break;
2641  }
2642  }
2643 
2644  if (req)
2645  {
2646  if (!(itemTemplate.AllowableClass & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
2647  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) does not have any playable classes (%u) in `AllowableClass` and can't be equipped or used.", entry, itemTemplate.AllowableClass);
2648 
2649  if (!(itemTemplate.AllowableRace & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
2650  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) does not have any playable races (%u) in `AllowableRace` and can't be equipped or used.", entry, itemTemplate.AllowableRace);
2651  }
2652  }
2653 
2654  if (itemTemplate.RequiredSpell && !sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itemTemplate.RequiredSpell))
2655  {
2656  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has a wrong (non-existing) spell in RequiredSpell (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.RequiredSpell);
2657  itemTemplate.RequiredSpell = 0;
2658  }
2659 
2660  if (itemTemplate.RequiredReputationRank >= MAX_REPUTATION_RANK)
2661  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong reputation rank in RequiredReputationRank (%u), item can't be used.", entry, itemTemplate.RequiredReputationRank);
2662 
2663  if (itemTemplate.RequiredReputationFaction)
2664  {
2665  if (!sFactionStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.RequiredReputationFaction))
2666  {
2667  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong (not existing) faction in RequiredReputationFaction (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.RequiredReputationFaction);
2668  itemTemplate.RequiredReputationFaction = 0;
2669  }
2670 
2671  if (itemTemplate.RequiredReputationRank == MIN_REPUTATION_RANK)
2672  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has min. reputation rank in RequiredReputationRank (0) but RequiredReputationFaction > 0, faction setting is useless.", entry);
2673  }
2674 
2675  if (itemTemplate.MaxCount < -1)
2676  {
2677  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has too large negative in maxcount (%i), replace by value (-1) no storing limits.", entry, itemTemplate.MaxCount);
2678  itemTemplate.MaxCount = -1;
2679  }
2680 
2681  if (itemTemplate.Stackable == 0)
2682  {
2683  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong value in stackable (%i), replace by default 1.", entry, itemTemplate.Stackable);
2684  itemTemplate.Stackable = 1;
2685  }
2686  else if (itemTemplate.Stackable < -1)
2687  {
2688  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has too large negative in stackable (%i), replace by value (-1) no stacking limits.", entry, itemTemplate.Stackable);
2689  itemTemplate.Stackable = -1;
2690  }
2691 
2692  if (itemTemplate.ContainerSlots > MAX_BAG_SIZE)
2693  {
2694  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has too large value in ContainerSlots (%u), replace by hardcoded limit (%u).", entry, itemTemplate.ContainerSlots, MAX_BAG_SIZE);
2695  itemTemplate.ContainerSlots = MAX_BAG_SIZE;
2696  }
2697 
2698  if (itemTemplate.StatsCount > MAX_ITEM_PROTO_STATS)
2699  {
2700  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has too large value in statscount (%u), replace by hardcoded limit (%u).", entry, itemTemplate.StatsCount, MAX_ITEM_PROTO_STATS);
2701  itemTemplate.StatsCount = MAX_ITEM_PROTO_STATS;
2702  }
2703 
2704  for (uint8 j = 0; j < itemTemplate.StatsCount; ++j)
2705  {
2706  // for ItemStatValue != 0
2707  if (itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatValue && itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatType >= MAX_ITEM_MOD)
2708  {
2709  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong (non-existing?) stat_type%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatType);
2710  itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatType = 0;
2711  }
2712 
2713  switch (itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatType)
2714  {
2715  case ITEM_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_DONE:
2716  case ITEM_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_DONE:
2717  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has deprecated stat_type%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.ItemStat[j].ItemStatType);
2718  break;
2719  default:
2720  break;
2721  }
2722  }
2723 
2724  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_DAMAGES; ++j)
2725  {
2726  if (itemTemplate.Damage[j].DamageType >= MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL)
2727  {
2728  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong dmg_type%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Damage[j].DamageType);
2729  itemTemplate.Damage[j].DamageType = 0;
2730  }
2731  }
2732 
2733  // special format
2734  if ((itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId == 483) || (itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId == 55884))
2735  {
2736  // spell_1
2737  if (itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellTrigger != ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE)
2738  {
2739  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong item spell trigger value in spelltrigger_%d (%u) for special learning format", entry, 0 + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellTrigger);
2740  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId = 0;
2741  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2742  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId = 0;
2743  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2744  }
2745 
2746  // spell_2 have learning spell
2747  if (itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger != ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_LEARN_SPELL_ID)
2748  {
2749  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong item spell trigger value in spelltrigger_%d (%u) for special learning format.", entry, 1 + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger);
2750  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId = 0;
2751  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId = 0;
2752  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2753  }
2754  else if (!itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId)
2755  {
2756  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) does not have an expected spell in spellid_%d in special learning format.", entry, 1 + 1);
2757  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId = 0;
2758  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2759  }
2760  else if (itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId != -1)
2761  {
2762  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId);
2763  if (!spellInfo && !DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId, nullptr))
2764  {
2765  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong (not existing) spell in spellid_%d (%d)", entry, 1 + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId);
2766  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId = 0;
2767  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId = 0;
2768  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2769  }
2770  // allowed only in special format
2771  else if ((itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId == 483) || (itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId == 55884))
2772  {
2773  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has broken spell in spellid_%d (%d)", entry, 1 + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId);
2774  itemTemplate.Spells[0].SpellId = 0;
2775  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellId = 0;
2776  itemTemplate.Spells[1].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2777  }
2778  }
2779 
2780  // spell_3*, spell_4*, spell_5* is empty
2781  for (uint8 j = 2; j < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++j)
2782  {
2783  if (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger != ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE)
2784  {
2785  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong item spell trigger value in spelltrigger_%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger);
2786  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId = 0;
2787  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2788  }
2789  else if (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId != 0)
2790  {
2791  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong spell in spellid_%d (%d) for learning special format", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId);
2792  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId = 0;
2793  }
2794  }
2795  }
2796  // normal spell list
2797  else
2798  {
2799  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++j)
2800  {
2801  if (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger >= MAX_ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER || itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger == ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_LEARN_SPELL_ID)
2802  {
2803  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong item spell trigger value in spelltrigger_%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger);
2804  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId = 0;
2805  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellTrigger = ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE;
2806  }
2807 
2808  if (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId && itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId != -1)
2809  {
2810  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId);
2811  if (!spellInfo && !DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId, nullptr))
2812  {
2813  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong (not existing) spell in spellid_%d (%d)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId);
2814  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId = 0;
2815  }
2816  // allowed only in special format
2817  else if ((itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId == 483) || (itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId == 55884))
2818  {
2819  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has broken spell in spellid_%d (%d)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId);
2820  itemTemplate.Spells[j].SpellId = 0;
2821  }
2822  }
2823  }
2824  }
2825 
2826  if (itemTemplate.Bonding >= MAX_BIND_TYPE)
2827  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Bonding value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Bonding);
2828 
2829  if (itemTemplate.PageText && !GetPageText(itemTemplate.PageText))
2830  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has non existing first page (Id:%u)", entry, itemTemplate.PageText);
2831 
2832  if (itemTemplate.LockID && !sLockStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.LockID))
2833  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong LockID (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.LockID);
2834 
2835  if (itemTemplate.Sheath >= MAX_SHEATHETYPE)
2836  {
2837  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Sheath (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Sheath);
2838  itemTemplate.Sheath = SHEATHETYPE_NONE;
2839  }
2840 
2841  if (itemTemplate.RandomProperty)
2842  {
2843  // To be implemented later
2844  if (itemTemplate.RandomProperty == -1)
2845  itemTemplate.RandomProperty = 0;
2846 
2847  else if (!sItemRandomPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(GetItemEnchantMod(itemTemplate.RandomProperty)))
2848  {
2849  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has unknown (wrong or not listed in `item_enchantment_template`) RandomProperty (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.RandomProperty);
2850  itemTemplate.RandomProperty = 0;
2851  }
2852  }
2853 
2854  if (itemTemplate.RandomSuffix && !sItemRandomSuffixStore.LookupEntry(GetItemEnchantMod(itemTemplate.RandomSuffix)))
2855  {
2856  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong RandomSuffix (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.RandomSuffix);
2857  itemTemplate.RandomSuffix = 0;
2858  }
2859 
2860  if (itemTemplate.ItemSet && !sItemSetStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.ItemSet))
2861  {
2862  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) have wrong ItemSet (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.ItemSet);
2863  itemTemplate.ItemSet = 0;
2864  }
2865 
2866  if (itemTemplate.Area && !sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.Area))
2867  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Area (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Area);
2868 
2869  if (itemTemplate.Map && !sMapStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.Map))
2870  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong Map (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.Map);
2871 
2872  if (itemTemplate.BagFamily)
2873  {
2874  // check bits
2875  for (uint32 j = 0; j < sizeof(itemTemplate.BagFamily) * 8; ++j)
2876  {
2877  uint32 mask = 1 << j;
2878  if ((itemTemplate.BagFamily & mask) == 0)
2879  continue;
2880 
2881  ItemBagFamilyEntry const* bf = sItemBagFamilyStore.LookupEntry(j + 1);
2882  if (!bf)
2883  {
2884  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has bag family bit set not listed in ItemBagFamily.dbc, remove bit", entry);
2885  itemTemplate.BagFamily &= ~mask;
2886  continue;
2887  }
2888 
2889  if (BAG_FAMILY_MASK_CURRENCY_TOKENS & mask)
2890  {
2891  CurrencyTypesEntry const* ctEntry = sCurrencyTypesStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.ItemId);
2892  if (!ctEntry)
2893  {
2894  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has currency bag family bit set in BagFamily but not listed in CurrencyTypes.dbc, remove bit", entry);
2895  itemTemplate.BagFamily &= ~mask;
2896  }
2897  }
2898  }
2899  }
2900 
2901  if (itemTemplate.TotemCategory && !sTotemCategoryStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.TotemCategory))
2902  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong TotemCategory (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.TotemCategory);
2903 
2904  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS; ++j)
2905  {
2906  if (itemTemplate.Socket[j].Color && (itemTemplate.Socket[j].Color & SOCKET_COLOR_ALL) != itemTemplate.Socket[j].Color)
2907  {
2908  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong socketColor_%d (%u)", entry, j + 1, itemTemplate.Socket[j].Color);
2909  itemTemplate.Socket[j].Color = 0;
2910  }
2911  }
2912 
2913  if (itemTemplate.GemProperties && !sGemPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.GemProperties))
2914  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong GemProperties (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.GemProperties);
2915 
2916  if (itemTemplate.FoodType >= MAX_PET_DIET)
2917  {
2918  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong FoodType value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.FoodType);
2919  itemTemplate.FoodType = 0;
2920  }
2921 
2922  if (itemTemplate.ItemLimitCategory && !sItemLimitCategoryStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.ItemLimitCategory))
2923  {
2924  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong LimitCategory value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.ItemLimitCategory);
2925  itemTemplate.ItemLimitCategory = 0;
2926  }
2927 
2928  if (itemTemplate.HolidayId && !sHolidaysStore.LookupEntry(itemTemplate.HolidayId))
2929  {
2930  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) has wrong HolidayId value (%u)", entry, itemTemplate.HolidayId);
2931  itemTemplate.HolidayId = 0;
2932  }
2933 
2934  if (itemTemplate.FlagsCu & ITEM_FLAGS_CU_DURATION_REAL_TIME && !itemTemplate.Duration)
2935  {
2936  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry %u) has flag ITEM_FLAGS_CU_DURATION_REAL_TIME but it does not have duration limit", entry);
2937  itemTemplate.FlagsCu &= ~ITEM_FLAGS_CU_DURATION_REAL_TIME;
2938  }
2939 
2940  // Fill categories map
2941  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++i)
2942  if (itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellId && itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellCategory && itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellCategoryCooldown)
2943  {
2944  SpellCategoryStore::iterator ct = sSpellsByCategoryStore.find(itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellCategory);
2945  if (ct != sSpellsByCategoryStore.end())
2946  {
2947  ct->second.emplace(true, itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellId);
2948  }
2949  else
2950  sSpellsByCategoryStore[itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellCategory].emplace(true, itemTemplate.Spells[i].SpellId);
2951  }
2952 
2953  ++count;
2954  } while (result->NextRow());
2955 
2956  // pussywizard:
2957  {
2958  uint32 max = 0;
2959  for (ItemTemplateContainer::const_iterator itr = _itemTemplateStore.begin(); itr != _itemTemplateStore.end(); ++itr)
2960  if (itr->first > max)
2961  max = itr->first;
2962  if (max)
2963  {
2964  _itemTemplateStoreFast.clear();
2965  _itemTemplateStoreFast.resize(max + 1, nullptr);
2966  for (ItemTemplateContainer::iterator itr = _itemTemplateStore.begin(); itr != _itemTemplateStore.end(); ++itr)
2967  _itemTemplateStoreFast[itr->first] = &(itr->second);
2968  }
2969  }
2970 
2971  for (ItemTemplateContainer::iterator itr = _itemTemplateStore.begin(); itr != _itemTemplateStore.end(); ++itr)
2972  itr->second.InitializeQueryData();
2973 
2974  // Check if item templates for DBC referenced character start outfit are present
2975  std::set<uint32> notFoundOutfit;
2976  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCharStartOutfitStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
2977  {
2978  CharStartOutfitEntry const* entry = sCharStartOutfitStore.LookupEntry(i);
2979  if (!entry)
2980  continue;
2981 
2982  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_OUTFIT_ITEMS; ++j)
2983  {
2984  if (entry->ItemId[j] <= 0)
2985  continue;
2986 
2987  uint32 item_id = entry->ItemId[j];
2988 
2989  if (!GetItemTemplate(item_id))
2990  notFoundOutfit.insert(item_id);
2991  }
2992  }
2993 
2994  for (std::set<uint32>::const_iterator itr = notFoundOutfit.begin(); itr != notFoundOutfit.end(); ++itr)
2995  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item (Entry: %u) does not exist in `item_template` but is referenced in `CharStartOutfit.dbc`", *itr);
2996 
2997  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u item templates in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2998  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2999 }
MAX_BAG_SIZE

void ObjectMgr::LoadLinkedRespawn ( )

Definition at line 1513 of file ObjectMgr.cpp.

1514 {
1515  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
1516 
1517  _linkedRespawnStore.clear();
1518  // 0 1 2
1519  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT guid, linkedGuid, linkType FROM linked_respawn ORDER BY guid ASC");
1520 
1521  if (!result)
1522  {
1523  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 linked respawns. DB table `linked_respawn` is empty.");
1524  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
1525  return;
1526  }
1527 
1528  do
1529  {
1530  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1531 
1532  ObjectGuid::LowType guidLow = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1533  ObjectGuid::LowType linkedGuidLow = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1534  uint8 linkType = fields[2].GetUInt8();
1535 
1536  ObjectGuid guid, linkedGuid;
1537  bool error = false;
1538  switch (linkType)
1539  {
1540  case CREATURE_TO_CREATURE:
1541  {
1542  const CreatureData* slave = GetCreatureData(guidLow);
1543  if (!slave)
1544  {
1545  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get creature data for GUIDLow %u", guidLow);
1546  error = true;
1547  break;
1548  }
1549 
1550  const CreatureData* master = GetCreatureData(linkedGuidLow);
1551  if (!master)
1552  {
1553  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get creature data for GUIDLow %u", linkedGuidLow);
1554  error = true;
1555  break;
1556  }
1557 
1558  const MapEntry* const map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(master->mapid);
1559  if (!map || !map->Instanceable() || (master->mapid != slave->mapid))
1560  {
1561  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature '%u' linking to '%u' on an unpermitted map.", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1562  error = true;
1563  break;
1564  }
1565 
1566  if (!(master->spawnMask & slave->spawnMask)) // they must have a possibility to meet (normal/heroic difficulty)
1567  {
1568  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "LinkedRespawn: Creature '%u' linking to '%u' with not corresponding spawnMask", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1569  error = true;
1570  break;
1571  }
1572 
1573  guid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(slave->id, guidLow);
1574  linkedGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(master->id, linkedGuidLow);
1575  break;
1576  }
1577  case CREATURE_TO_GO:
1578  {
1579  const CreatureData* slave = GetCreatureData(guidLow);
1580  if (!slave)
1581  {
1582  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get creature data for GUIDLow %u", guidLow);
1583  error = true;
1584  break;
1585  }
1586 
1587  const GameObjectData* master = GetGOData(linkedGuidLow);
1588  if (!master)
1589  {
1590  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get gameobject data for GUIDLow %u", linkedGuidLow);
1591  error = true;
1592  break;
1593  }
1594 
1595  const MapEntry* const map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(master->mapid);
1596  if (!map || !map->Instanceable() || (master->mapid != slave->mapid))
1597  {
1598  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature '%u' linking to '%u' on an unpermitted map.", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1599  error = true;
1600  break;
1601  }
1602 
1603  if (!(master->spawnMask & slave->spawnMask)) // they must have a possibility to meet (normal/heroic difficulty)
1604  {
1605  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "LinkedRespawn: Creature '%u' linking to '%u' with not corresponding spawnMask", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1606  error = true;
1607  break;
1608  }
1609 
1610  guid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(slave->id, guidLow);
1611  linkedGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::GameObject>(master->id, linkedGuidLow);
1612  break;
1613  }
1614  case GO_TO_GO:
1615  {
1616  const GameObjectData* slave = GetGOData(guidLow);
1617  if (!slave)
1618  {

1621  break;
1622  }

1626  {
1627  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get gameobject data for GUIDLow %u", linkedGuidLow);
1628  error = true;
1629  break;
1630  }
1631

1633  if (!map || !map->Instanceable() || (master->mapid != slave->mapid))
1634  {
1635  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature '%u' linking to '%u' on an unpermitted map.", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1636  error = true;
1637  break;
1638  }
1639 
1640  if (!(master->spawnMask & slave->spawnMask)) // they must have a possibility to meet (normal/heroic difficulty)
1641  {
1642  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "LinkedRespawn: Creature '%u' linking to '%u' with not corresponding spawnMask", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1643  error = true;
1644  break;
1645  }
1646 
1647  guid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::GameObject>(slave->id, guidLow);
1648  linkedGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::GameObject>(master->id, linkedGuidLow);
1649  break;
1650  }
1651  case GO_TO_CREATURE:
1652  {
1653  const GameObjectData* slave = GetGOData(guidLow);
1654  if (!slave)
1655  {
1656  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get gameobject data for GUIDLow %u", guidLow);
1657  error = true;
1658  break;
1659  }
1660 
1661  const CreatureData* master = GetCreatureData(linkedGuidLow);
1662  if (!master)
1663  {
1664  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Couldn't get creature data for GUIDLow %u", linkedGuidLow);
1665  error = true;
1666  break;
1667  }
1668

1670  if (!map || !map->Instanceable() || (master->mapid != slave->mapid))
1671  {
1672  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature '%u' linking to '%u' on an unpermitted map.", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1673  error = true;
1674  break;
1675  }
1676 
1677  if (!(master->spawnMask & slave->spawnMask)) // they must have a possibility to meet (normal/heroic difficulty)
1678  {
1679  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "LinkedRespawn: Creature '%u' linking to '%u' with not corresponding spawnMask", guidLow, linkedGuidLow);
1680  error = true;
1681  break;
1682  }

1685  linkedGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(master->id, linkedGuidLow);
1686  break;
1687  }
1688  }
1689 
1690  if (!error)
1691  _linkedRespawnStore[guid] = linkedGuid;
1692  } while (result->NextRow());
1693 
1694  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded " UI64FMTD " linked respawns in %u ms", uint64(_linkedRespawnStore.size()), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));

◆ LoadMailLevelRewards()

void ObjectMgr::LoadMailLevelRewards ( )

Definition at line 8222 of file ObjectMgr.cpp.

8223 {
8224  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
8225 
8226  _mailLevelRewardStore.clear(); // for reload case
8227 
8228  // 0 1 2 3
8229  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT level, raceMask, mailTemplateId, senderEntry FROM mail_level_reward");
8230 
8231  if (!result)
8232  {
8233  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 level dependent mail rewards. DB table `mail_level_reward` is empty.");
8234  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
8235  return;
8236  }
8237 
8238  uint32 count = 0;
8239 
8240  do
8241  {
8242  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
8243 
8244  uint8 level = fields[0].GetUInt8();
8245  uint32 raceMask = fields[1].GetUInt32();
8246  uint32 mailTemplateId = fields[2].GetUInt32();
8247  uint32 senderEntry = fields[3].GetUInt32();
8248 
8249  if (level > MAX_LEVEL)
8250  {
8251  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `mail_level_reward` have data for level %u that more supported by client (%u), ignoring.", level, MAX_LEVEL);
8252  continue;
8253  }
8254 
8255  if (!(raceMask & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
8256  {
8257  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `mail_level_reward` have raceMask (%u) for level %u that not include any player races, ignoring.", raceMask, level);
8258  continue;
8259  }
8260 
8261  if (!sMailTemplateStore.LookupEntry(mailTemplateId))
8262  {
8263  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `mail_level_reward` have invalid mailTemplateId (%u) for level %u that invalid not include any player races, ignoring.", mailTemplateId, level);
8264  continue;
8265  }
8266 
8267  if (!GetCreatureTemplate(senderEntry))
8268  {
8269  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `mail_level_reward` have not existed sender creature entry (%u) for level %u that invalid not include any player races, ignoring.", senderEntry, level);
8270  continue;
8271  }
8272 
8273  _mailLevelRewardStore[level].push_back(MailLevelReward(raceMask, mailTemplateId, senderEntry));
8274 
8275  ++count;
8276  } while (result->NextRow());
8277 
8278  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u level dependent mail rewards in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
8279  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
8280 }
MAX_LEVEL
#define MAX_LEVEL
Definition: DBCEnums.h:28

◆ LoadNPCSpellClickSpells()

void ObjectMgr::LoadNPCSpellClickSpells ( )

Definition at line 7408 of file ObjectMgr.cpp.

7409 {
7410  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
7411 
7412  _spellClickInfoStore.clear();
7413  // 0 1 2 3
7414  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT npc_entry, spell_id, cast_flags, user_type FROM npc_spellclick_spells");
7415 
7416  if (!result)
7417  {
7418  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 spellclick spells. DB table `npc_spellclick_spells` is empty.");
7419  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
7420  return;
7421  }
7422 
7423  uint32 count = 0;
7424 
7425  do
7426  {
7427  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
7428 
7429  uint32 npc_entry = fields[0].GetUInt32();
7430  CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate(npc_entry);
7431  if (!cInfo)
7432  {
7433  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table npc_spellclick_spells references unknown creature_template %u. Skipping entry.", npc_entry);
7434  continue;
7435  }
7436 
7437  uint32 spellid = fields[1].GetUInt32();
7438  SpellInfo const* spellinfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spellid);
7439  if (!spellinfo)
7440  {
7441  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table npc_spellclick_spells references unknown spellid %u. Skipping entry.", spellid);
7442  continue;
7443  }
7444 
7445  uint8 userType = fields[3].GetUInt16();
7446  if (userType >= SPELL_CLICK_USER_MAX)
7447  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table npc_spellclick_spells references unknown user type %u. Skipping entry.", uint32(userType));
7448 
7449  uint8 castFlags = fields[2].GetUInt8();
7450  SpellClickInfo info;
7451  info.spellId = spellid;
7452  info.castFlags = castFlags;
7453  info.userType = SpellClickUserTypes(userType);
7454  _spellClickInfoStore.insert(SpellClickInfoContainer::value_type(npc_entry, info));
7455 
7456  ++count;
7457  } while (result->NextRow());
7458 
7459  // all spellclick data loaded, now we check if there are creatures with NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK but with no data
7460  // NOTE: It *CAN* be the other way around: no spellclick flag but with spellclick data, in case of creature-only vehicle accessories
7461  CreatureTemplateContainer const* ctc = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplates();
7462  for (CreatureTemplateContainer::const_iterator itr = ctc->begin(); itr != ctc->end(); ++itr)
7463  {
7464  if ((itr->second.npcflag & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK) && _spellClickInfoStore.find(itr->second.Entry) == _spellClickInfoStore.end())
7465  {
7466  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "npc_spellclick_spells: Creature template %u has UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK but no data in spellclick table! Removing flag", itr->second.Entry);
7467  const_cast<CreatureTemplate*>(&itr->second)->npcflag &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK;
7468  }
7469  }
7470 
7471  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u spellclick definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
7472  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
7473 }

3224 
3225  if (!result)
3226  {
3227  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 level pet stats definitions. DB table `pet_levelstats` is empty.");
3228  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3229  return;
3230  }
3231 
3232  uint32 count = 0;
3233 
3234  do
3235  {
3236  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3237 
3238  uint32 creature_id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
3239  if (!sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(creature_id))
3240  {
3241  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong creature id %u in `pet_levelstats` table, ignoring.", creature_id);
3242  continue;
3243  }
3244 
3245  uint32 current_level = fields[1].GetUInt8();
3246  if (current_level > sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3247  {
3248  if (current_level > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL) // hardcoded level maximum
3249  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong (> %u) level %u in `pet_levelstats` table, ignoring.", STRONG_MAX_LEVEL, current_level);
3250  else
3251  {
3252  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "Unused (> MaxPlayerLevel in worldserver.conf) level %u in `pet_levelstats` table, ignoring.", current_level);
3253  ++count; // make result loading percent "expected" correct in case disabled detail mode for example.
3254  }
3255  continue;
3256  }
3257  else if (current_level < 1)
3258  {
3259  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong (<1) level %u in `pet_levelstats` table, ignoring.", current_level);
3260  continue;
3261  }
3262 
3263  PetLevelInfo*& pInfoMapEntry = _petInfoStore[creature_id];
3264 
3265  if (pInfoMapEntry == nullptr)
3266  pInfoMapEntry = new PetLevelInfo[sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL)];
3267 
3268  // data for level 1 stored in [0] array element, ...
3269  PetLevelInfo* pLevelInfo = &pInfoMapEntry[current_level - 1];
3270 
3271  pLevelInfo->health = fields[2].GetUInt16();
3272  pLevelInfo->mana = fields[3].GetUInt16();
3273  pLevelInfo->armor = fields[9].GetUInt32();
3274  pLevelInfo->min_dmg = fields[10].GetUInt16();
3275  pLevelInfo->max_dmg = fields[11].GetUInt16();
3276  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_STATS; i++)
3277  {
3278  pLevelInfo->stats[i] = fields[i + 4].GetUInt16();
3279  }
3280 
3281  ++count;
3282  } while (result->NextRow());
3283 
3284  // Fill gaps and check integrity
3285  for (PetLevelInfoContainer::iterator itr = _petInfoStore.begin(); itr != _petInfoStore.end(); ++itr)
3286  {
3287  PetLevelInfo* pInfo = itr->second;
3288 
3289  // fatal error if no level 1 data
3290  if (!pInfo || pInfo[0].health == 0)
3291  {
3292  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature %u does not have pet stats data for Level 1!", itr->first);
3293  exit(1);
3294  }
3295 
3296  // fill level gaps
3297  for (uint8 level = 1; level < sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL); ++level)
3298  {
3299  if (pInfo[level].health == 0)
3300  {
3301  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature %u has no data for Level %i pet stats data, using data of Level %i.", itr->first, level + 1, level);
3302  pInfo[level] = pInfo[level - 1];
3303  }
3304  }
3305  }
3306 
3307  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u level pet stats definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3308  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3309 }

3423  continue;

3438  } while (result->NextRow());

3446  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Items Data...");
3447  {

3449  // 0 1 2 3

3451

3453  {
3454  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 custom player create items. DB table `playercreateinfo_item` is empty.");

3456  }

3458  {
3459  uint32 count = 0;
3460

3462  {
3463  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3464 
3465  uint32 current_race = fields[0].GetUInt8();
3466  if (current_race >= MAX_RACES)
3467  {
3468  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong race %u in `playercreateinfo_item` table, ignoring.", current_race);
3469  continue;
3470  }
3471 
3472  uint32 current_class = fields[1].GetUInt8();
3473  if (current_class >= MAX_CLASSES)
3474  {
3475  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class %u in `playercreateinfo_item` table, ignoring.", current_class);
3476  continue;
3477  }
3478 
3479  uint32 item_id = fields[2].GetUInt32();
3480 
3481  if (!GetItemTemplate(item_id))
3482  {
3483  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item id %u (race %u class %u) in `playercreateinfo_item` table but not listed in `item_template`, ignoring.", item_id, current_race, current_class);
3484  continue;
3485  }
3486 
3487  int32 amount = fields[3].GetInt32();
3488 
3489  if (!amount)
3490  {
3491  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Item id %u (class %u race %u) have amount == 0 in `playercreateinfo_item` table, ignoring.", item_id, current_race, current_class);
3492  continue;
3493  }
3494 
3495  if (!current_race || !current_class)
3496  {
3497  uint32 min_race = current_race ? current_race : 1;
3498  uint32 max_race = current_race ? current_race + 1 : MAX_RACES;
3499  uint32 min_class = current_class ? current_class : 1;
3500  uint32 max_class = current_class ? current_class + 1 : MAX_CLASSES;
3501  for (uint32 r = min_race; r < max_race; ++r)
3502  for (uint32 c = min_class; c < max_class; ++c)
3503  PlayerCreateInfoAddItemHelper(r, c, item_id, amount);
3504  }
3505  else
3506  PlayerCreateInfoAddItemHelper(current_race, current_class, item_id, amount);
3507 
3508  ++count;
3509  } while (result->NextRow());
3510 
3511  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u custom player create items in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3512  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3513  }
3514  }
3515 
3516  // Load playercreate skills
3517  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Skill Data...");
3518  {
3519  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3520 
3521  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT raceMask, classMask, skill, `rank` FROM playercreateinfo_skills");
3522 
3523  if (!result)
3524  {
3525  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 player create skills. DB table `playercreateinfo_skills` is empty.");
3526  }
3527  else
3528  {
3529  uint32 count = 0;
3530 
3531  do
3532  {
3533  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3534  uint32 raceMask = fields[0].GetUInt32();
3535  uint32 classMask = fields[1].GetUInt32();
3536  PlayerCreateInfoSkill skill;
3537  skill.SkillId = fields[2].GetUInt16();
3538  skill.Rank = fields[3].GetUInt16();
3539 
3540  if (skill.Rank >= MAX_SKILL_STEP)
3541  {
3542  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Skill rank value %hu set for skill %hu raceMask %u classMask %u is too high, max allowed value is %d", skill.Rank, skill.SkillId, raceMask, classMask, MAX_SKILL_STEP);
3543  continue;
3544  }
3545 
3546  if (raceMask != 0 && !(raceMask & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
3547  {
3548  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong race mask %u in `playercreateinfo_skills` table, ignoring.", raceMask);
3549  continue;
3550  }
3551 
3552  if (classMask != 0 && !(classMask & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
3553  {
3554  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class mask %u in `playercreateinfo_skills` table, ignoring.", classMask);
3555  continue;
3556  }
3557 
3558  if (!sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(skill.SkillId))
3559  {
3560  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong skill id %u in `playercreateinfo_skills` table, ignoring.", skill.SkillId);
3561  continue;
3562  }
3563 
3564  for (uint32 raceIndex = RACE_HUMAN; raceIndex < MAX_RACES; ++raceIndex)
3565  {
3566  if (raceMask == 0 || ((1 << (raceIndex - 1)) & raceMask))
3567  {
3568  for (uint32 classIndex = CLASS_WARRIOR; classIndex < MAX_CLASSES; ++classIndex)
3569  {
3570  if (classMask == 0 || ((1 << (classIndex - 1)) & classMask))
3571  {
3572  if (!GetSkillRaceClassInfo(skill.SkillId, raceIndex, classIndex))
3573  continue;
3574 
3575  if (PlayerInfo* info = _playerInfo[raceIndex][classIndex])
3576  {
3577  info->skills.push_back(skill);
3578  ++count;
3579  }
3580  }
3581  }
3582  }
3583  }
3584  } while (result->NextRow());
3585 
3586  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u player create skills in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3587  }
3588  }
3589 
3590  // Load playercreate spells
3591  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Spell Data...");
3592  {
3593  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3594 
3595  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT racemask, classmask, Spell FROM playercreateinfo_spell_custom");
3596 
3597  if (!result)
3598  {
3599  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 player create spells. DB table `playercreateinfo_spell_custom` is empty.");
3600  }
3601  else
3602  {
3603  uint32 count = 0;
3604 
3605  do
3606  {
3607  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3608  uint32 raceMask = fields[0].GetUInt32();
3609  uint32 classMask = fields[1].GetUInt32();
3610  uint32 spellId = fields[2].GetUInt32();
3611 
3612  if (raceMask != 0 && !(raceMask & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
3613  {
3614  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong race mask %u in `playercreateinfo_spell_custom` table, ignoring.", raceMask);
3615  continue;
3616  }
3617 
3618  if (classMask != 0 && !(classMask & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
3619  {
3620  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class mask %u in `playercreateinfo_spell_custom` table, ignoring.", classMask);
3621  continue;
3622  }
3623 
3624  for (uint32 raceIndex = RACE_HUMAN; raceIndex < MAX_RACES; ++raceIndex)
3625  {
3626  if (raceMask == 0 || ((1 << (raceIndex - 1)) & raceMask))
3627  {
3628  for (uint32 classIndex = CLASS_WARRIOR; classIndex < MAX_CLASSES; ++classIndex)
3629  {
3630  if (classMask == 0 || ((1 << (classIndex - 1)) & classMask))
3631  {
3632  if (PlayerInfo* info = _playerInfo[raceIndex][classIndex])
3633  {
3634  info->customSpells.push_back(spellId);
3635  ++count;
3636  }
3637  }
3638  }
3639  }
3640  }
3641  } while (result->NextRow());
3642 
3643  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u custom player create spells in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3644  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3645  }
3646  }
3647 
3648  // Load playercreate actions
3649  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Action Data...");
3650  {
3651  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3652 
3653  // 0 1 2 3 4
3654  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT race, class, button, action, type FROM playercreateinfo_action");
3655 
3656  if (!result)
3657  {
3658  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 player create actions. DB table `playercreateinfo_action` is empty.");
3659  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3660  }
3661  else
3662  {
3663  uint32 count = 0;
3664 
3665  do
3666  {
3667  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3668 
3669  uint32 current_race = fields[0].GetUInt8();
3670  if (current_race >= MAX_RACES)
3671  {
3672  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong race %u in `playercreateinfo_action` table, ignoring.", current_race);
3673  continue;
3674  }
3675 
3676  uint32 current_class = fields[1].GetUInt8();
3677  if (current_class >= MAX_CLASSES)
3678  {
3679  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class %u in `playercreateinfo_action` table, ignoring.", current_class);
3680  continue;
3681  }
3682 
3683  if (PlayerInfo* info = _playerInfo[current_race][current_class])
3684  info->action.push_back(PlayerCreateInfoAction(fields[2].GetUInt16(), fields[3].GetUInt32(), fields[4].GetUInt16()));
3685 
3686  ++count;
3687  } while (result->NextRow());
3688 
3689  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u player create actions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3690  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3691  }
3692  }
3693 
3694  // Loading levels data (class only dependent)
3695  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Level HP/Mana Data...");
3696  {
3697  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3698 
3699  // 0 1 2 3
3700  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT class, level, basehp, basemana FROM player_classlevelstats");
3701 
3702  if (!result)
3703  {
3704  LOG_FATAL("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 level health/mana definitions. DB table `player_classlevelstats` is empty.");
3705  exit(1);
3706  }
3707 
3708  uint32 count = 0;
3709 
3710  do
3711  {
3712  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3713 
3714  uint32 current_class = fields[0].GetUInt8();
3715  if (current_class >= MAX_CLASSES)
3716  {
3717  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class %u in `player_classlevelstats` table, ignoring.", current_class);
3718  continue;
3719  }
3720 
3721  uint8 current_level = fields[1].GetUInt8(); // Can't be > than STRONG_MAX_LEVEL (hardcoded level maximum) due to var type
3722  if (current_level > sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3723  {
3724  LOG_INFO("sql.sql", "Unused (> MaxPlayerLevel in worldserver.conf) level %u in `player_classlevelstats` table, ignoring.", current_level);
3725  ++count; // make result loading percent "expected" correct in case disabled detail mode for example.
3726  continue;
3727  }
3728 
3729  PlayerClassInfo* info = _playerClassInfo[current_class];
3730  if (!info)
3731  {
3732  info = new PlayerClassInfo();
3733  info->levelInfo = new PlayerClassLevelInfo[sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL)];
3734  _playerClassInfo[current_class] = info;
3735  }
3736 
3737  PlayerClassLevelInfo& levelInfo = info->levelInfo[current_level - 1];
3738 
3739  levelInfo.basehealth = fields[2].GetUInt16();
3740  levelInfo.basemana = fields[3].GetUInt16();
3741 
3742  ++count;
3743  } while (result->NextRow());
3744 
3745  // Fill gaps and check integrity
3746  for (int class_ = 0; class_ < MAX_CLASSES; ++class_)
3747  {
3748  // skip non existed classes
3749  if (!sChrClassesStore.LookupEntry(class_))
3750  continue;
3751 
3752  PlayerClassInfo* pClassInfo = _playerClassInfo[class_];
3753 
3754  // fatal error if no level 1 data
3755  if (!pClassInfo->levelInfo || pClassInfo->levelInfo[0].basehealth == 0)
3756  {
3757  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Class %i Level 1 does not have health/mana data!", class_);
3758  exit(1);
3759  }
3760 
3761  // fill level gaps
3762  for (uint8 level = 1; level < sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL); ++level)
3763  {
3764  if (pClassInfo->levelInfo[level].basehealth == 0)
3765  {
3766  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Class %i Level %i does not have health/mana data. Using stats data of level %i.", class_, level + 1, level);
3767  pClassInfo->levelInfo[level] = pClassInfo->levelInfo[level - 1];
3768  }
3769  }
3770  }
3771 
3772  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u level health/mana definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3773  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3774  }
3775 
3776  // Loading levels data (class/race dependent)
3777  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create Level Stats Data...");
3778  {
3779  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3780 
3781  // 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
3782  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT race, class, level, str, agi, sta, inte, spi FROM player_levelstats");
3783 
3784  if (!result)
3785  {
3786  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 level stats definitions. DB table `player_levelstats` is empty.");
3787  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3788  exit(1);
3789  }
3790 
3791  uint32 count = 0;
3792 
3793  do
3794  {
3795  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3796 
3797  uint32 current_race = fields[0].GetUInt8();
3798  if (current_race >= MAX_RACES)
3799  {
3800  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong race %u in `player_levelstats` table, ignoring.", current_race);
3801  continue;
3802  }
3803 
3804  uint32 current_class = fields[1].GetUInt8();
3805  if (current_class >= MAX_CLASSES)
3806  {
3807  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong class %u in `player_levelstats` table, ignoring.", current_class);
3808  continue;
3809  }
3810 
3811  uint32 current_level = fields[2].GetUInt8();
3812  if (current_level > sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3813  {
3814  if (current_level > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL) // hardcoded level maximum
3815  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong (> %u) level %u in `player_levelstats` table, ignoring.", STRONG_MAX_LEVEL, current_level);
3816  else
3817  {
3818  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "Unused (> MaxPlayerLevel in worldserver.conf) level %u in `player_levelstats` table, ignoring.", current_level);
3819  ++count; // make result loading percent "expected" correct in case disabled detail mode for example.
3820  }
3821  continue;
3822  }
3823 
3824  if (PlayerInfo* info = _playerInfo[current_race][current_class])
3825  {
3826  if (!info->levelInfo)
3827  info->levelInfo = new PlayerLevelInfo[sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL)];
3828 
3829  PlayerLevelInfo& levelInfo = info->levelInfo[current_level - 1];
3830  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_STATS; i++)
3831  levelInfo.stats[i] = fields[i + 3].GetUInt8();
3832  }
3833 
3834  ++count;
3835  } while (result->NextRow());
3836 
3837  // Fill gaps and check integrity
3838  for (int race = 0; race < MAX_RACES; ++race)
3839  {
3840  // skip non existed races
3841  if (!sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(race))
3842  continue;
3843 
3844  for (int class_ = 0; class_ < MAX_CLASSES; ++class_)
3845  {
3846  // skip non existed classes
3847  if (!sChrClassesStore.LookupEntry(class_))
3848  continue;
3849 
3850  PlayerInfo* info = _playerInfo[race][class_];
3851  if (!info)
3852  continue;
3853 
3854  // skip expansion races if not playing with expansion
3855  if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_EXPANSION) < EXPANSION_THE_BURNING_CRUSADE && (race == RACE_BLOODELF || race == RACE_DRAENEI))
3856  continue;
3857 
3858  // skip expansion classes if not playing with expansion
3859  if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_EXPANSION) < EXPANSION_WRATH_OF_THE_LICH_KING && class_ == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
3860  continue;
3861 
3862  // fatal error if no level 1 data
3863  if (!info->levelInfo || info->levelInfo[0].stats[0] == 0)
3864  {
3865  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Race %i Class %i Level 1 does not have stats data!", race, class_);
3866  exit(1);
3867  }
3868 
3869  // fill level gaps
3870  for (uint8 level = 1; level < sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL); ++level)
3871  {
3872  if (info->levelInfo[level].stats[0] == 0)
3873  {
3874  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Race %i Class %i Level %i does not have stats data. Using stats data of level %i.", race, class_, level + 1, level);
3875  info->levelInfo[level] = info->levelInfo[level - 1];
3876  }
3877  }
3878  }
3879  }
3880 
3881  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u level stats definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3882  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3883  }
3884 
3885  // Loading xp per level data
3886  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading Player Create XP Data...");
3887  {
3888  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3889 
3890  _playerXPperLevel.resize(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL));
3891  for (uint8 level = 0; level < sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL); ++level)
3892  _playerXPperLevel[level] = 0;
3893 
3894  // 0 1
3895  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT Level, Experience FROM player_xp_for_level");
3896 
3897  if (!result)
3898  {
3899  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", ">> Loaded 0 xp for level definitions. DB table `player_xp_for_level` is empty.");
3900  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3901  exit(1);
3902  }
3903 
3904  uint32 count = 0;
3905 
3906  do
3907  {
3908  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3909 
3910  uint32 current_level = fields[0].GetUInt8();
3911  uint32 current_xp = fields[1].GetUInt32();
3912 
3913  if (current_level >= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3914  {
3915  if (current_level > STRONG_MAX_LEVEL) // hardcoded level maximum
3916  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Wrong (> %u) level %u in `player_xp_for_level` table, ignoring.", STRONG_MAX_LEVEL, current_level);
3917  else
3918  {
3919  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "Unused (> MaxPlayerLevel in worldserver.conf) level %u in `player_xp_for_levels` table, ignoring.", current_level);
3920  ++count; // make result loading percent "expected" correct in case disabled detail mode for example.
3921  }
3922  continue;
3923  }
3924  //PlayerXPperLevel
3925  _playerXPperLevel[current_level] = current_xp;
3926  ++count;
3927  } while (result->NextRow());
3928 
3929  // fill level gaps
3930  for (uint8 level = 1; level < sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL); ++level)
3931  {
3932  if (_playerXPperLevel[level] == 0)
3933  {
3934  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Level %i does not have XP for level data. Using data of level [%i] + 100.", level + 1, level);
3935  _playerXPperLevel[level] = _playerXPperLevel[level - 1] + 100;
3936  }
3937  }
3938 
3939  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u xp for level definitions in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3940  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3941  }
3942 }

446  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
447 
448  _pointOfInterestLocaleStore.clear(); // need for reload case
449 
450  // 0 1 2

452

454  return;
455 
456  do
457  {

459

464  continue;

◆ LoadQuestAreaTriggers()

void ObjectMgr::LoadQuestAreaTriggers ( )

Definition at line 5835 of file ObjectMgr.cpp.

5836 {
5837  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
5838 
5839  _questAreaTriggerStore.clear(); // need for reload case
5840 
5841  QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT id, quest FROM areatrigger_involvedrelation");
5842 
5843  if (!result)
5844  {
5845  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 quest trigger points. DB table `areatrigger_involvedrelation` is empty.");
5846  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
5847  return;
5848  }
5849 
5850  uint32 count = 0;
5851 
5852  do
5853  {
5854  ++count;
5855 
5856  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
5857 
5858  uint32 trigger_ID = fields[0].GetUInt32();
5859  uint32 quest_ID = fields[1].GetUInt32();
5860 
5861  AreaTrigger const* atEntry = GetAreaTrigger(trigger_ID);
5862  if (!atEntry)
5863  {
5864  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Area trigger (ID:%u) does not exist in `AreaTrigger.dbc`.", trigger_ID);
5865  continue;
5866  }
5867 
5868  Quest const* quest = GetQuestTemplate(quest_ID);
5869 
5870  if (!quest)
5871  {
5872  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `areatrigger_involvedrelation` has record (id: %u) for not existing quest %u", trigger_ID, quest_ID);
5873  continue;
5874  }
5875 
5876  if (!quest->HasSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT))
5877  {
5878  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `areatrigger_involvedrelation` has record (id: %u) for not quest %u, but quest not have specialflag QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT. Trigger or quest flags must be fixed, quest modified to require objective.", trigger_ID, quest_ID);
5879 
5880  // this will prevent quest completing without objective
5881  const_cast<Quest*>(quest)->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT);
5882 
5883  // continue; - quest modified to required objective and trigger can be allowed.
5884  }
5885 
5886  _questAreaTriggerStore[trigger_ID] = quest_ID;
5887  } while (result->NextRow());

5889  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %u quest trigger points in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));

7372  POIs[questId].resize(id + 10);

7375  POIs[questId][id].push_back(point);
7376  } while (points->NextRow());

7388  uint32 FloorId = fields[5].GetUInt32();

7390  uint32 unk4 = fields[7].GetUInt32();
7391 
7392  QuestPOI POI(id, objIndex, mapId, WorldMapAreaId, FloorId, unk3, unk4);
7393  if (questId < POIs.size() && id < POIs[questId].size())
7394  {
7395  POI.points = POIs[questId][id];
7396  _questPOIStore[questId].push_back(POI);
7397  }
7398  else
7399  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table quest_poi references unknown quest points for quest %u POI id %u", questId, id);
7400

7402  } while (result->NextRow());

4214  else
4215  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Table `quest_template_addon` has data for quest %u but such quest does not exist", questId);
4216  } while (result->NextRow());
4217  }
4218 
4219  // Post processing
4220  for (QuestMap::iterator iter = _questTemplates.begin(); iter != _questTemplates.end(); ++iter)
4221  {
4222  // skip post-loading checks for disabled quests
4223  if (DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_QUEST, iter->first, nullptr))
4224  continue;
4225 
4226  Quest* qinfo = iter->second;
4227 
4228  // additional quest integrity checks (GO, creature_template and item_template must be loaded already)
4229 
4230  if (qinfo->GetQuestMethod() >= 3)
4231  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `Method` = %u, expected values are 0, 1 or 2.", qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetQuestMethod());
4232 
4233  if (qinfo->SpecialFlags & ~QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_DB_ALLOWED)
4234  {
4235  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `SpecialFlags` = %u > max allowed value. Correct `SpecialFlags` to value <= %u",
4236  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->SpecialFlags, QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_DB_ALLOWED);
4237  qinfo->SpecialFlags &= QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_DB_ALLOWED;
4238  }
4239 
4240  if (qinfo->Flags & QUEST_FLAGS_DAILY && qinfo->Flags & QUEST_FLAGS_WEEKLY)
4241  {
4242  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Weekly Quest %u is marked as daily quest in `Flags`, removed daily flag.", qinfo->GetQuestId());
4243  qinfo->Flags &= ~QUEST_FLAGS_DAILY;
4244  }
4245 
4246  if (qinfo->Flags & QUEST_FLAGS_DAILY)
4247  {
4248  if (!(qinfo->SpecialFlags & QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE))
4249  {
4250  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Daily Quest %u not marked as repeatable in `SpecialFlags`, added.", qinfo->GetQuestId());
4251  qinfo->SpecialFlags |= QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE;
4252  }
4253  }
4254 
4255  if (qinfo->Flags & QUEST_FLAGS_WEEKLY)
4256  {
4257  if (!(qinfo->SpecialFlags & QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE))
4258  {
4259  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Weekly Quest %u not marked as repeatable in `SpecialFlags`, added.", qinfo->GetQuestId());
4260  qinfo->SpecialFlags |= QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE;
4261  }
4262  }
4263 
4264  if (qinfo->SpecialFlags & QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_MONTHLY)
4265  {
4266  if (!(qinfo->SpecialFlags & QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE))
4267  {
4268  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Monthly quest %u not marked as repeatable in `SpecialFlags`, added.", qinfo->GetQuestId());
4269  qinfo->SpecialFlags |= QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_REPEATABLE;
4270  }
4271  }
4272 
4273  if (qinfo->Flags & QUEST_FLAGS_TRACKING)
4274  {
4275  // at auto-reward can be rewarded only RewardChoiceItemId[0]
4276  for (int j = 1; j < QUEST_REWARD_CHOICES_COUNT; ++j )
4277  {
4278  if (uint32 id = qinfo->RewardChoiceItemId[j])
4279  {
4280  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardChoiceItemId%d` = %u but item from `RewardChoiceItemId%d` can't be rewarded with quest flag QUEST_FLAGS_TRACKING.",
4281  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, j + 1);
4282  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4283  }
4284  }
4285  }
4286 
4287  // client quest log visual (area case)
4288  if (qinfo->ZoneOrSort > 0)
4289  {
4290  if (!sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->ZoneOrSort))
4291  {
4292  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `ZoneOrSort` = %u (zone case) but zone with this id does not exist.",
4293  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->ZoneOrSort);
4294  // no changes, quest not dependent from this value but can have problems at client
4295  }
4296  }
4297  // client quest log visual (sort case)
4298  if (qinfo->ZoneOrSort < 0)
4299  {
4300  QuestSortEntry const* qSort = sQuestSortStore.LookupEntry(-int32(qinfo->ZoneOrSort));
4301  if (!qSort)
4302  {
4303  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `ZoneOrSort` = %i (sort case) but quest sort with this id does not exist.",
4304  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->ZoneOrSort);
4305  // no changes, quest not dependent from this value but can have problems at client (note some may be 0, we must allow this so no check)
4306  }
4307  //check for proper RequiredSkillId value (skill case)
4308  if (uint32 skill_id = SkillByQuestSort(-int32(qinfo->ZoneOrSort)))
4309  {
4310  if (qinfo->RequiredSkillId != skill_id)
4311  {
4312  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `ZoneOrSort` = %i but `RequiredSkillId` does not have a corresponding value (%d).",
4313  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->ZoneOrSort, skill_id);
4314  //override, and force proper value here?
4315  }
4316  }
4317  }
4318 
4319  // RequiredClasses, can be 0/CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE to allow any class
4320  if (qinfo->RequiredClasses)
4321  {
4322  if (!(qinfo->RequiredClasses & CLASSMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
4323  {
4324  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u does not contain any playable classes in `RequiredClasses` (%u), value set to 0 (all classes).", qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredClasses);
4325  qinfo->RequiredClasses = 0;
4326  }
4327  }
4328  // AllowableRaces, can be 0/RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE to allow any race
4329  if (qinfo->AllowableRaces)
4330  {
4331  if (!(qinfo->AllowableRaces & RACEMASK_ALL_PLAYABLE))
4332  {
4333  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u does not contain any playable races in `AllowableRaces` (%u), value set to 0 (all races).", qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->AllowableRaces);
4334  qinfo->AllowableRaces = 0;
4335  }
4336  }
4337  // RequiredSkillId, can be 0
4338  if (qinfo->RequiredSkillId)
4339  {
4340  if (!sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RequiredSkillId))
4341  {
4342  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredSkillId` = %u but this skill does not exist",
4343  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredSkillId);
4344  }
4345  }
4346 
4347  if (qinfo->RequiredSkillPoints)
4348  {
4349  if (qinfo->RequiredSkillPoints > sWorld->GetConfigMaxSkillValue())
4350  {
4351  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredSkillPoints` = %u but max possible skill is %u, quest can't be done.",
4352  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredSkillPoints, sWorld->GetConfigMaxSkillValue());
4353  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4354  }
4355  }
4356  // else Skill quests can have 0 skill level, this is ok
4357 
4358  if (qinfo->RequiredFactionId2 && !sFactionStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RequiredFactionId2))
4359  {
4360  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredFactionId2` = %u but faction template %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4361  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredFactionId2, qinfo->RequiredFactionId2);
4362  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4363  }
4364 
4365  if (qinfo->RequiredFactionId1 && !sFactionStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RequiredFactionId1))
4366  {
4367  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredFactionId1` = %u but faction template %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4368  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredFactionId1, qinfo->RequiredFactionId1);
4369  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4370  }
4371 
4372  if (qinfo->RequiredMinRepFaction && !sFactionStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RequiredMinRepFaction))
4373  {
4374  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMinRepFaction` = %u but faction template %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4375  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMinRepFaction, qinfo->RequiredMinRepFaction);
4376  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4377  }
4378 
4379  if (qinfo->RequiredMaxRepFaction && !sFactionStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RequiredMaxRepFaction))
4380  {
4381  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMaxRepFaction` = %u but faction template %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4382  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMaxRepFaction, qinfo->RequiredMaxRepFaction);
4383  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4384  }
4385 
4386  if (qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue && qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue > ReputationMgr::Reputation_Cap)
4387  {
4388  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMinRepValue` = %d but max reputation is %u, quest can't be done.",
4389  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue, ReputationMgr::Reputation_Cap);
4390  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4391  }
4392 
4393  if (qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue && qinfo->RequiredMaxRepValue && qinfo->RequiredMaxRepValue <= qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue)
4394  {
4395  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMaxRepValue` = %d and `RequiredMinRepValue` = %d, quest can't be done.",
4396  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMaxRepValue, qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue);
4397  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4398  }
4399 
4400  if (!qinfo->RequiredFactionId1 && qinfo->RequiredFactionValue1 != 0)
4401  {
4402  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredFactionValue1` = %d but `RequiredFactionId1` is 0, value has no effect",
4403  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredFactionValue1);
4404  // warning
4405  }
4406 
4407  if (!qinfo->RequiredFactionId2 && qinfo->RequiredFactionValue2 != 0)
4408  {
4409  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredFactionValue2` = %d but `RequiredFactionId2` is 0, value has no effect",
4410  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredFactionValue2);
4411  // warning
4412  }
4413 
4414  if (!qinfo->RequiredMinRepFaction && qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue != 0)
4415  {
4416  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMinRepValue` = %d but `RequiredMinRepFaction` is 0, value has no effect",
4417  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMinRepValue);
4418  // warning
4419  }
4420 
4421  if (!qinfo->RequiredMaxRepFaction && qinfo->RequiredMaxRepValue != 0)
4422  {
4423  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredMaxRepValue` = %d but `RequiredMaxRepFaction` is 0, value has no effect",
4424  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RequiredMaxRepValue);
4425  // warning
4426  }
4427 
4428  if (qinfo->RewardTitleId && !sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RewardTitleId))
4429  {
4430  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardTitleId` = %u but CharTitle Id %u does not exist, quest can't be rewarded with title.",
4431  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetCharTitleId(), qinfo->GetCharTitleId());
4432  qinfo->RewardTitleId = 0;
4433  // quest can't reward this title
4434  }
4435 
4436  if (qinfo->StartItem)
4437  {
4438  if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(qinfo->StartItem))
4439  {
4440  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `StartItem` = %u but item with entry %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4441  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->StartItem, qinfo->StartItem);
4442  qinfo->StartItem = 0; // quest can't be done for this requirement
4443  }
4444  else if (qinfo->StartItemCount == 0)
4445  {
4446  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `StartItem` = %u but `StartItemCount` = 0, set to 1 but need fix in DB.",
4447  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->StartItem);
4448  qinfo->StartItemCount = 1; // update to 1 for allow quest work for backward compatibility with DB
4449  }
4450  }
4451  else if (qinfo->StartItemCount > 0)
4452  {
4453  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `StartItem` = 0 but `StartItemCount` = %u, useless value.",
4454  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->StartItemCount);
4455  qinfo->StartItemCount = 0; // no quest work changes in fact
4456  }
4457 
4458  if (qinfo->SourceSpellid)
4459  {
4460  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(qinfo->SourceSpellid);
4461  if (!spellInfo)
4462  {
4463  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `SourceSpellid` = %u but spell %u doesn't exist, quest can't be done.",
4464  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->SourceSpellid, qinfo->SourceSpellid);
4465  qinfo->SourceSpellid = 0; // quest can't be done for this requirement
4466  }
4467  else if (!SpellMgr::ComputeIsSpellValid(spellInfo))
4468  {
4469  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `SourceSpellid` = %u but spell %u is broken, quest can't be done.",
4470  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->SourceSpellid, qinfo->SourceSpellid);
4471  qinfo->SourceSpellid = 0; // quest can't be done for this requirement
4472  }
4473  }
4474 
4475  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_ITEM_OBJECTIVES_COUNT; ++j)
4476  {
4477  uint32 id = qinfo->RequiredItemId[j];
4478  if (id)
4479  {
4480  if (qinfo->RequiredItemCount[j] == 0)
4481  {
4482  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredItemId%d` = %u but `RequiredItemCount%d` = 0, quest can't be done.",
4483  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, j + 1);
4484  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4485  }
4486 
4487  qinfo->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_DELIVER);
4488 
4489  if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(id))
4490  {
4491  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredItemId%d` = %u but item with entry %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4492  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, id);
4493  qinfo->RequiredItemCount[j] = 0; // prevent incorrect work of quest
4494  }
4495  }
4496  else if (qinfo->RequiredItemCount[j] > 0)
4497  {
4498  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredItemId%d` = 0 but `RequiredItemCount%d` = %u, quest can't be done.",
4499  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->RequiredItemCount[j]);
4500  qinfo->RequiredItemCount[j] = 0; // prevent incorrect work of quest
4501  }
4502  }
4503 
4504  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_SOURCE_ITEM_IDS_COUNT; ++j)
4505  {
4506  uint32 id = qinfo->ItemDrop[j];
4507  if (id)
4508  {
4509  if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(id))
4510  {
4511  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `ItemDrop%d` = %u but item with entry %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4512  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, id);
4513  // no changes, quest can't be done for this requirement
4514  }
4515  }
4516  else
4517  {
4518  if (qinfo->ItemDropQuantity[j] > 0)
4519  {
4520  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `ItemDrop%d` = 0 but `ItemDropQuantity%d` = %u.",
4521  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->ItemDropQuantity[j]);
4522  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4523  }
4524  }
4525  }
4526 
4527  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_OBJECTIVES_COUNT; ++j)
4528  {
4529  int32 id = qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGo[j];
4530  if (id < 0 && !sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(-id))
4531  {
4532  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredNpcOrGo%d` = %i but gameobject %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4533  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, uint32(-id));
4534  qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGo[j] = 0; // quest can't be done for this requirement
4535  }
4536 
4537  if (id > 0 && !sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(id))
4538  {
4539  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredNpcOrGo%d` = %i but creature with entry %u does not exist, quest can't be done.",
4540  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, uint32(id));
4541  qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGo[j] = 0; // quest can't be done for this requirement
4542  }
4543 
4544  if (id)
4545  {
4546  // In fact SpeakTo and Kill are quite same: either you can speak to mob:SpeakTo or you can't:Kill/Cast
4547 
4548  qinfo->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_KILL | QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_CAST | QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_SPEAKTO);
4549 
4550  if (!qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGoCount[j])
4551  {
4552  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredNpcOrGo%d` = %u but `RequiredNpcOrGoCount%d` = 0, quest can't be done.",
4553  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, j + 1);
4554  // no changes, quest can be incorrectly done, but we already report this
4555  }
4556  }
4557  else if (qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGoCount[j] > 0)
4558  {
4559  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RequiredNpcOrGo%d` = 0 but `RequiredNpcOrGoCount%d` = %u.",
4560  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->RequiredNpcOrGoCount[j]);
4561  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4562  }
4563  }
4564 
4565  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_REWARD_CHOICES_COUNT; ++j)
4566  {
4567  uint32 id = qinfo->RewardChoiceItemId[j];
4568  if (id)
4569  {
4570  if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(id))
4571  {
4572  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardChoiceItemId%d` = %u but item with entry %u does not exist, quest will not reward this item.",
4573  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, id);
4574  qinfo->RewardChoiceItemId[j] = 0; // no changes, quest will not reward this
4575  }
4576 
4577  if (!qinfo->RewardChoiceItemCount[j])
4578  {
4579  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardChoiceItemId%d` = %u but `RewardChoiceItemCount%d` = 0, quest can't be done.",
4580  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, j + 1);
4581  // no changes, quest can't be done
4582  }
4583  }
4584  else if (qinfo->RewardChoiceItemCount[j] > 0)
4585  {
4586  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardChoiceItemId%d` = 0 but `RewardChoiceItemCount%d` = %u.",
4587  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->RewardChoiceItemCount[j]);
4588  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4589  }
4590  }
4591 
4592  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_REWARDS_COUNT; ++j)
4593  {
4594  uint32 id = qinfo->RewardItemId[j];
4595  if (id)
4596  {
4597  if (!sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(id))
4598  {
4599  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardItemId%d` = %u but item with entry %u does not exist, quest will not reward this item.",
4600  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, id);
4601  qinfo->RewardItemId[j] = 0; // no changes, quest will not reward this item
4602  }
4603 
4604  if (!qinfo->RewardItemIdCount[j])
4605  {
4606  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardItemId%d` = %u but `RewardItemIdCount%d` = 0, quest will not reward this item.",
4607  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, id, j + 1);
4608  // no changes
4609  }
4610  }
4611  else if (qinfo->RewardItemIdCount[j] > 0)
4612  {
4613  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardItemId%d` = 0 but `RewardItemIdCount%d` = %u.",
4614  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->RewardItemIdCount[j]);
4615  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4616  }
4617  }
4618 
4619  for (uint8 j = 0; j < QUEST_REPUTATIONS_COUNT; ++j)
4620  {
4621  if (qinfo->RewardFactionId[j])
4622  {
4623  if (abs(qinfo->RewardFactionValueId[j]) > 9)
4624  {
4625  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has RewardFactionValueId%d = %i. That is outside the range of valid values (-9 to 9).", qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, qinfo->RewardFactionValueId[j]);
4626  }
4627  if (!sFactionStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RewardFactionId[j]))
4628  {
4629  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardFactionId%d` = %u but raw faction (faction.dbc) %u does not exist, quest will not reward reputation for this faction.", qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, qinfo->RewardFactionId[j], qinfo->RewardFactionId[j]);
4630  qinfo->RewardFactionId[j] = 0; // quest will not reward this
4631  }
4632  }
4633 
4634  else if (qinfo->RewardFactionValueIdOverride[j] != 0)
4635  {
4636  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardFactionId%d` = 0 but `RewardFactionValueIdOverride%d` = %i.",
4637  qinfo->GetQuestId(), j + 1, j + 1, qinfo->RewardFactionValueIdOverride[j]);
4638  // no changes, quest ignore this data
4639  }
4640  }
4641 
4642  if (qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell)
4643  {
4644  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell);
4645 
4646  if (!spellInfo)
4647  {
4648  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardDisplaySpell` = %u but spell %u does not exist, spell removed as display reward.",
4649  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell, qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell);
4650  qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell = 0; // no spell reward will display for this quest
4651  }
4652 
4653  else if (!SpellMgr::ComputeIsSpellValid(spellInfo))
4654  {
4655  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardDisplaySpell` = %u but spell %u is broken, quest will not have a spell reward.",
4656  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell, qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell);
4657  qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell = 0; // no spell reward will display for this quest
4658  }
4659 
4660  else if (GetTalentSpellCost(qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell))
4661  {
4662  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardDisplaySpell` = %u but spell %u is talent, quest will not have a spell reward.",
4663  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell, qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell);
4664  qinfo->RewardDisplaySpell = 0; // no spell reward will display for this quest
4665  }
4666  }
4667 
4668  if (qinfo->RewardSpell > 0)
4669  {
4670  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(qinfo->RewardSpell);
4671 
4672  if (!spellInfo)
4673  {
4674  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardSpell` = %u but spell %u does not exist, quest will not have a spell reward.",
4675  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardSpell, qinfo->RewardSpell);
4676  qinfo->RewardSpell = 0; // no spell will be casted on player
4677  }
4678 
4679  else if (!SpellMgr::ComputeIsSpellValid(spellInfo))
4680  {
4681  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardSpell` = %u but spell %u is broken, quest will not have a spell reward.",
4682  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardSpell, qinfo->RewardSpell);
4683  qinfo->RewardSpell = 0; // no spell will be casted on player
4684  }
4685 
4686  else if (GetTalentSpellCost(qinfo->RewardSpell))
4687  {
4688  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardDisplaySpell` = %u but spell %u is talent, quest will not have a spell reward.",
4689  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardSpell, qinfo->RewardSpell);
4690  qinfo->RewardSpell = 0; // no spell will be casted on player
4691  }
4692  }
4693 
4694  if (qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId)
4695  {
4696  if (!sMailTemplateStore.LookupEntry(qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId))
4697  {
4698  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardMailTemplateId` = %u but mail template %u does not exist, quest will not have a mail reward.",
4699  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId, qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId);
4700  qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId = 0; // no mail will send to player
4701  qinfo->RewardMailDelay = 0; // no mail will send to player
4702  qinfo->RewardMailSenderEntry = 0;
4703  }
4704  else if (usedMailTemplates.find(qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId) != usedMailTemplates.end())
4705  {
4706  std::map<uint32, uint32>::const_iterator used_mt_itr = usedMailTemplates.find(qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId);
4707  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardMailTemplateId` = %u but mail template %u already used for quest %u, quest will not have a mail reward.",
4708  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId, qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId, used_mt_itr->second);
4709  qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId = 0; // no mail will send to player
4710  qinfo->RewardMailDelay = 0; // no mail will send to player
4711  qinfo->RewardMailSenderEntry = 0;
4712  }
4713  else
4714  usedMailTemplates[qinfo->RewardMailTemplateId] = qinfo->GetQuestId();
4715  }
4716 
4717  if (qinfo->RewardNextQuest)
4718  {
4719  QuestMap::iterator qNextItr = _questTemplates.find(qinfo->RewardNextQuest);
4720  if (qNextItr == _questTemplates.end())
4721  {
4722  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %u has `RewardNextQuest` = %u but quest %u does not exist, quest chain will not work.",
4723  qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->RewardNextQuest, qinfo->RewardNextQuest);
4724  qinfo->RewardNextQuest = 0;
4725  }
4726  else
4727  qNextItr->second->prevChainQuests.push_back(qinfo->GetQuestId());
4728  }
4729 
4730  // fill additional data stores
4731  if (qinfo->PrevQuestId)
4732  {
4733  if (_questTemplates.find(abs(qinfo->GetPrevQuestId())) == _questTemplates.end())
4734  {
4735  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %d has PrevQuestId %i, but no such quest", qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetPrevQuestId());
4736  }
4737  else
4738  {
4739  qinfo->prevQuests.push_back(qinfo->PrevQuestId);
4740  }
4741  }
4742 
4743  if (qinfo->NextQuestId)
4744  {
4745  QuestMap::iterator qNextItr = _questTemplates.find(qinfo->GetNextQuestId());
4746  if (qNextItr == _questTemplates.end())
4747  {
4748  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Quest %d has NextQuestId %u, but no such quest", qinfo->GetQuestId(), qinfo->GetNextQuestId());
4749  }
4750  else
4751  qNextItr->second->prevQuests.push_back(static_cast<int32>(qinfo->GetQuestId()));
4752  }
4753 
4754  if (qinfo->ExclusiveGroup)
4755  mExclusiveQuestGroups.insert(std::pair<int32, uint32>(qinfo->ExclusiveGroup, qinfo->GetQuestId()));
4756  if (qinfo->TimeAllowed)
4757  qinfo->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_TIMED);
4758  if (qinfo->RequiredPlayerKills)
4759  qinfo->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_PLAYER_KILL);
4760  }
4761 
4762  // check QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT for spell with SPELL_EFFECT_QUEST_COMPLETE
4763  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfoStoreSize(); ++i)
4764  {
4765  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(i);
4766  if (!spellInfo)
4767  continue;
4768 
4769  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
4770  {
4771  if (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_QUEST_COMPLETE)
4772  continue;
4773 
4774  uint32 quest_id = spellInfo->Effects[j].MiscValue;
4775 
4776  Quest const* quest = GetQuestTemplate(quest_id);
4777 
4778  // some quest referenced in spells not exist (outdated spells)
4779  if (!quest)
4780  continue;
4781 
4782  if (!quest->HasSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT))
4783  {
4784  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Spell (id: %u) have SPELL_EFFECT_QUEST_COMPLETE for quest %u, but quest not have specialflag QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT. Quest flags must be fixed, quest modified to enable objective.", spellInfo->Id, quest_id);
4785 
4786  // this will prevent quest completing without objective
4787  // xinef: remove this, leave error but do not break the quest
4788  // const_cast<Quest*>(quest)->SetSpecialFlag(QUEST_SPECIAL_FLAGS_EXPLORATION_OR_EVENT);
4789  }
4790  }
4791  }
4792 
4793  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %lu quests definitions in %u ms", (unsigned long)_questTemplates.size(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
4794  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
4795 }
